item.name: discountList
item.param:
discounts\[\d+\]\.id, discounts\[\d+\]\.title, discounts\[\d+\]\.content, discounts\[\d+\]\.bookCount, discounts\[\d+\]\.bookUnit, discounts\[\d+\]\.startDate, discounts\[\d+\]\.endDate, discounts\[\d+\]\.createDate, discounts\[\d+\]\.status, discounts\[\d+\]\.status\._name, discounts\[\d+\]\.status\.desc, discounts\[\d+\]\.discountPictures, discounts\[\d+\]\.discountPictures\[\d+\]\.picUrlPath, discounts\[\d+\]\.discountPictures\[\d+\]\.name,
pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage

item.name: discountSignal
item.param: id, title, content, bookCount, bookUnit, startDate, endDate, createDate, status, status\._name, status\.desc, discountPictures, discountPictures\[\d+\]\.picUrlPath, discountPictures\[\d+\]\.id, discountPictures\[\d+\]\.name
